Enchantment 8

Haunted Forest
Ritual
N5D1
spell id [id]: 965
effect number [effect_number]: 81
damage [damage]: 55
number of effects [nreff]: 1
gems required [gemcost]: 60N
Enchant Battlefield | Enchant World:Haunted Forest
Vines will merge with anyone killed in the God's Dominion, creating an undead Manikin. The Manikin will fight any enemies of the God for a short while before it is totally dissolved by the vines. Undead or inanimate beings are not affected by the spell.
